bill_title: to revise the provisions concerning the procedure for filing a summons.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the provisions concerning the procedure for filing a summons. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 15-2-30 be amended to read as follows: 15-2-30. An action is commenced as to each defendant when the certified copy of the summons , which has been filed with the clerk of courts, is served on him the defendant , or on a codefendant who is a joint contractor or otherwise united in interest with him the defendant . Section 2. That § 15-2-31 be amended to read as follows: 15-2-31. An attempt to commence an action is deemed equivalent to the commencement thereof when the the certified copy of the summons , which has been filed with the clerk of courts, is delivered, with the intent that it the summons shall be actually served, to the sheriff or other officer of the county in which the one or more of the defendants or one of them, usually resides or last resided; or if a corporation be is the defendant, to the sheriff or other officer of the county in which such corporation was established by law, or where its general business was transacted, or where it kept an office for the transaction of business. Such an An attempt must shall be followed by the first publication of the summons, or the service thereof of the summons , within sixty days.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
